meanings.definition: Stop the continuous progress of an activity or process by causing a disturbance or problem.
meanings.sent1: Please stop interrupting the class with your loud talking.
meanings.sent2: The phone call interrupted her concentration on the homework.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog kept interrupting the peaceful silence of the night.
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunderstorm interrupted the outdoor birthday party.
meanings.sent5: The power outage interrupted the live broadcast of the game.

meanings.definition: Break the continuity of a line or surface.
meanings.sent1: The road construction interrupted the smooth flow of traffic.
meanings.sent2: The fence was interrupted by a large gate for the driveway.
meanings.sent3: The colorful mural was interrupted by a large crack in the wall.
meanings.sent4: The straight line was interrupted by a sudden curve in the road.
meanings.sent5: The pattern on the fabric was interrupted by a misplaced stitch.
